clarification_text: FIGHT/SHOOT WEAPON. Warrior gains + to F and S.
name: AC-40 "JUSTIFIER"
text: LIGHT MACHINE GUN WITH INTEGRATED CHAIN BAYONET. FIGHT/SHOOT. Warrior gains +3 to F and S.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. DOOMTROOPER. FREELANCER. Agent Michaels also has all five Corporate affiliations. He will never lose these affiliations, and will never become a HERETIC. He may be Assigned Missions during your turn for no action cost. He may earn P.
name: AGENT NICK MICHAELS
text: PERSONALITY. (Not considered part of the Brotherhood) He may never lose Cartel affiliation, nor may he ever become a Heretic.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A CAPITOL WARRIOR. VEHICLE. AIRSHIP. When inside this airship, the warrior's base S, A, and V are doubled. No WEAPONS may be used when using the Guardian.
name: AH/UH-19 GRAPESHOT GUARDIAN
text: AIRSHIP AND VEHICLE. MAY BE GIVEN TO ANY CAPITOL DOOMTROOPER. A WARRIOR CAN ONLY HAVE 1 VEHICLE. When flying this airship, the warrior's S, A and V are doubled. No other weapons may be used when using the Guardian.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. RAMS AIR CAVALRY. VEHICLE. AIRSHIP. May never take part in Fight combats, be in cover, or use equipment. Opponents do not gain the effects of Fortifications while combating Bartholomew. Other RAMS AIR CAVALRY gain + to S and A while in the same Combat Area with Bartholomew.
name: AIRMAN TREVOR BARTHOLOMEW
text: PERSONALITY. CONSIDERED A RAMS AIR CAVALRY, AN AIRSHIP AND A VEHICLE. Can only take part in Shoot combats. Can't seek cover or use equipment. Attacks ignore opponent's fortifications. While in play, all RAMS AIR CAVALRY gain +1 to S and A.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. HERO. FOLLOWER AND NEPHARITE OF ALGEROTH. ART IMMUNITY. Alakhai may have any Dark Symmetry cards, and MAJOR GIFTS OF ALGEROTH may be bestowed on him at any time for no actions. Every 1D he spends on a Dark Symmetry effect is worth 2D.
name: ALAKHAI THE CUNNING
text: PERSONALITY. FOLLOWER AND NEPHARITE OF ALGEROTH. IMMUNE TO THE ART. Alakhai may have any Dark Symmetry cards, and Gifts of Algeroth may be bestowed on him at any time for no actions. Every 1D he spends on a Dark Symmetry effect is worth 2D.

clarification_text: PLAY DURING COMBAT. The Defender gains FIRST STRIKE. If the Attacker is wounded, the combat is over. If not, the Attacker retaliates.
name: AMBUSH
text: Play during combat, Resolve the Defender's attack first. If the Attacker is wounded, the combat is over. If not, resolve the Attacker's attack. This happens after playing all combat modifiers.

clarification_text: MAJOR GIFT OF DEMNOGONIS. Once per turn, as actions, the warrior will look through any player's discard pile and place a warrior from it into your Kohort. Halve its combat ratings (round up). If killed again, annihilate it. It can't have Dark Symmetry cards and is PROFANE.
name: ANIMATE DEAD
text: GIFT OF DEMNOGONIS. Once per turn, as three actions, the warrior can raise the dead. Place a warrior from any player's discard pile in your Kohort. Halve its combat ratings (round up). If killed again, remove it from play. It can't use Art or Dark Symmetry.

clarification_text: May conjure the Arts of CHANGELING and ELEMENTS. May be equipped with any non-Warrior AIRSHIP, even those only allowed to certain affiliations.
name: ARCHANGEL
text: Archangels may conjure the Arts of Changeling and Elements. They may be equipped with any non-warrior airship, even those only allowed to certain affiliations.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. INQUISITOR. COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. BLESSED. While in play, opponents' DOOMTROOPERS may not voluntarily Seek Cover. If wounded, you may spend 1 action and 5D to heal him.
name: ARCHINQUISITOR NIKODEMUS
text: PERSONALITY. Nikodemus may use all Art cards and is immune to Dark Symmetry cards. While he's in play, Doomtroopers can't voluntarily seek cover. If he's wounded, you may spend 1 action and 5 D to heal him and wound another of your Doomtroopers.

clarification_text: ASSIGN TO ANY WARRIOR. This warrior must choose a healthy warrior (one with no wounds) when you assign the Mission and kill it to complete the mission and earn points equal to twice the Value of the assassinated warrior. If the target is removed from play by other means, this card is NOT removed, and becomes ineffective.
name: ASSASSINATION
text: Warrior - This warrior must choose a healthy warrior (one with no wounds) and kill it to complete the mission and earn points equal to twice the Value of the assassinated warrior.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY DOOMTROOPER AT ANY TIME. While attached, the affected warrior may cast any Art spell if you first spend 2D for each casting.
name: AT PEACE WITH THE ART
text: GIVE TO ANY DOOMTROOPER AT ANY TIME. For the remainder of the game, the affected warrior may cast any non-Combat Art spell if you first spend 2 D for each casting.

name: AUTOMATIC FIRE
text: Play during combat on Machine Gun - The bonus given by the weapon is doubled for this combat.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A DARK LEGION WARRIOR. SPECIAL WEAPON. Discard after one use. Provides +4 to F and S. If the opponent does not die, it and all the warriors in the same Combat Area become diseased and suffer 3 to their base A until the END of your next turn.
name: BACTERIA GRENADE
text: MAY ONLY BE GIVEN TO A DARK LEGION WARRIOR. SPECIAL WEAPON. Discard after one use. +4 to F and S. Unless opponent dies, it's diseased; during each of its player's Draw steps, he must either place a marker on the diseased warrior or spend 3 D. For every marker, warrior is -1 to V. If warriors drops to 0 V, it is discarded. Additional Grenades are ignored.

clarification_text: PLAY IMMEDIATELY AFTER ANY PLAYER EARNS PROMOTION POINTS. The affected player earns no P (D taken is unaffected). For every 1P the player was going to take, you earn 2D.
name: BAMBOOZLED!
text: PLAY IMMEDIATELY AFTER A PLAYER EARNS PROMOTION POINTS. Spies discover the warrior's goals and defraud the results. All Promotion Points the player just earned are lost. Place twice the number of Destiny Points into your pool.

clarification_text: During combat, the Blitzer may pay 3D and target any one Special card attached to its opponent. That card has no effect on play until the combat is over. Multiple Special cards may be targeted (at a cost of 3D each).
flavor: Handpicked paratroopers of the Bauhaus Clan Romanov, the Bauhaus Blitzers are used for particularly demanding sabotage and recon missions.
name: BAUHAUS BLITZER

clarification_text: PLACE IN YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. ARTILLERY. You must spend 6D to put the Infurior into play. Every turn, as three actions, you may discard any Fortification card in play.
name: BAUHAUS GREAT INFURIOR
text: YOU MAY PLACE THE INFURIOR IN YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. ARTILLERY. You must spend 6 Destiny Points to put the Infurior into play. Every turn, as three actions, you may discard any Fortification in play.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY SHOOT WEAPON. The weapon may also be used as a Fight weapon, and increases the warrior's F by +2 while it is in play. A weapon may only have one Bayonet.
name: BAYONET
text: ATTACH TO ANY SHOOT WEAPON. The weapon can now be used as a Fight weapon too. Increase warrior's F by +2.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. FREE MARINE. COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. Other FREE MARINES have COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY while in the same Combat Area with Watts. Once per turn (from your Draw step to your next Draw step) you may discard 1 (and only 1) card from your hand at any time to give Watts + to A until the beginning of your next turn.
name: BIG BOB WATTS
text: PERSONALITY. CONSIDERED A FREE MARINE. While Big Bob is in play, all of your Free Marines are immune to the effects of Dark Symmetry cards.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. HERETIC. He may have MINOR GIFTS bestowed on him as normal, and for every 5 D, Billy may have one MAJOR GIFT OF APOSTLE bestowed on him.
name: BILLY
text: PERSONALITY. Billy is considered a Heretic. He may have DARK SYMMETRY GIFT cards bestowed on him as normal, and for every 5 D, Billy may have one GIFT OF APOSTLE card bestowed on him.

clarification_text: GIVE TO ANY DOOMTROOPER. ARMOR. The warrior gains +5 to A, is BLESSED, and gains COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY.
name: BLESSED ARMOR
text: ARMOR. GIVE ONLY TO A DOOMTROOPER. The warrior is immune to all Dark Symmetry cards. A warrior may only be equipped with one suit of ARMOR.

clarification_text: FOLLOWER OF DEMNOGONIS. LEGIONNAIRE. SLAYER.
name: BLESSED LEGIONNAIRE
text: FOLLOWER OF DEMNOGONIS. Warriors wounded by Blessed Legionnaires are automatically killed.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. VALKYRIE. COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. BLESSED. Other VALKYRIES gain + to F, S and A, have COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY and are BLESSED while in the same Combat Area with the Vestal.
name: BLESSED VESTAL LAURA
text: PERSONALITY. CONSIDERED A VALKYRIE. While LAURA is in play, all of your VALKYRIE warriors may use all Disciples of the Art and are immune to Dark Symmetry cards.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY NON-PERSONALITY WARRIOR AT ANY TIME. This warrior is overtaken by battle-frenzy, and may now attack any other warrior in play, regardless of affiliation.
name: BLIND FURY
text: PLAY ON ANY NON-PERSONALITY WARRIOR DURING COMBAT, BEFORE ATTACKER AND DEFENDER IS ANNOUNCED. This warrior is overtaken by a mad battle-frenzy, and may attack any other warrior in play, regardless of affiliation. Discard this card after the combat.

name: BLINDNESS
text: DARK SYMMETRY GIFT. The opponents of this warrior suffer a -2 penalty to their F and S.

clarification_text: COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. Gains +2 to F, S, and A when in combat against FOLLOWERS OF ALGEROTH.
name: BLOOD BERET
text: Immune to the effects of DARK SYMMETRY GIFT cards, but not GIFT OF APOSTLE cards.

clarification_text: PLAY DURING YOUR TURN, BEFORE YOU PERFORM ANY ACTIONS. You may perform an extra Tactical Action this turn (and your third action does not have to be a Tactical Action). You may only play this card once per turn.
name: BLOOD LUST
text: PLAY AT THE BEGINNING OF YOUR TURN. You may perform an extra attack action this turn. Do not choose the Attacker or Defender of the second attack until after the first attack is complete.

clarification_text: PLAY DURING A TEAM GAME ON ANY ONE OPPONENT DURING YOUR TURN. The affected player misses his next turn.
name: BOGGED DOWN
text: PLAY ON OPPONENT DURING YOUR TURN. The affected player misses his or her next turn.

clarification_text: PLAY IMMEDIATELY AFTER ANY NON-BROTHERHOOD DOOMTROOPER IS PLACED IN ANY SQUAD. The Doomtrooper that just joined the Squad has friends in high places. You may spend 5D and gain 3P, once.
flavor: The Doomtrooper that just joined the Squad has friends in high places.
name: BORN WITH A SILVER SPOON
text: PLAY IMMEDIATELY AFTER A NON-BROTHERHOOD DOOMTROOPER IS PLACED IN YOUR SQUAD. You may spend 5 D and gain 3 Promotion Points, once.

clarification_text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. You may discard any number of Mission cards currently in play. This card may not be used to counter a just-fulfilled mission.
name: BOTCHED ORDERS
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. One mission, chosen by you, is discarded.

clarification_text: FOLLOWER OF DEMNOGONIS. Any warrior wounded by the Cairath is killed, and the warrior is taken out of play instead of simply discarded. Dark Symmetry cards may not be played on Cairaths.
name: CAIRATH
text: FOLLOWER OF DEMNOGONIS. Any warrior wounded by the Cairath is killed, and the warrior is taken out of play instead of simply discarded.

clarification_text: FOLLOWER OF SEMAI. If wounded, the Callistonian Intruder may heal itself at any time by spending 6D. The Intruder may not heal itself if the wound causes it to be killed.
name: CALLISTONIAN INTRUDER
text: FOLLOWER OF SEMAI. If wounded, the Callistonian Intruder may heal itself at any time by spending 6 D.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A CYBERTRONIC WARRIOR. VEHICLE. AIRSHIP. When inside this airship, the warrior's base S, A, and V are doubled. No WEAPONS may be used when using the CAP 7000P.
name: CAP 7000P
text: AIRSHIP AND VEHICLE. MAY BE GIVEN TO ANY CYBERTRONIC DOOMTROOPER. A WARRIOR CAN ONLY HAVE 1 VEHICLE. When flying this airship, the warrior's S, A and V are doubled. No other weapons may be used when using the CAP 7000P.

name: CAPITOL SWORD OF HONOR
text: MAY ONLY BE GIVEN TO A CAPITOL DOOMTROOPER. FIGHT WEAPON. The warrior gains +1 to F.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. CARDINAL. COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. BLESSED. SLAYER. May only attack the Dark Legion warrior with the highest V in play (your warriors and NONCOMBATANTS are exempt). HERETICS cannot attack Dominic. While in play, all Brotherhood members in play have COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY.
name: CARDINAL DOMINIC
text: PERSONALITY. May use all aspects of the Art. May only attack the Dark Legion warrior in play with the highest V. Heretics cannot attack Dominic. All warriors wounded by him are killed. While he's in play. All Brotherhood members are Immune to Dark Symmetry cards.

clarification_text: FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH. Gains +2 to F, S, and A for each UNDEAD LEGIONNAIRE in the same Combat Area.
name: CENTURION
text: FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH. Centurions are heretics transformed through Dark Symmetry to become elite soldiers and commanders in Algeroth's Legions.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO YOUR BROTHERHOOD WARRIOR AS ONE ACTION. While attached, all Brotherhood warriors in the same Combat Area as this warrior may use the Art of Changeling.
name: CHANGELING EMPATHY
text: PLAY ON ONE OF YOUR BROTHERHOOD WARRIORS AS ONE ACTION. From now on, all Brotherhood warriors in your Squad may use the Art of Changeling. If the warrior is killed, this card is discarded.

clarification_text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. An enormous ravine stretches before the combatants, cutting off all contact. Only Shoot combats may be made until the beginning of your next turn. This instantly ends a Fight combat.
name: CHASM!
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. Only shoot combat may be made until te beginning of your next turn. This instantly ends fight combat.

clarification_text: COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. PROFANE. May graft an already-attached WEAPON to its body as one action. Grafted WEAPONS may never be discarded or annihilated unless the Chasseur is discarded or annihilated as well.
name: CHASSEUR
text: Immune to the effects of DARK SYMMETRY GIFT cards, but not GIFT OF APOSTLE cards. May never cast Art Spells.

clarification_text: MINOR SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. PROFANE. SLAYER.
name: CHEMIMAN
text: Immune to the effects of DARK SYMMETRY GIFT cards, but not GIFT OF APOSTLE cards. May never cast Art Spells. Any warrior wounded by the ChemiMan is automatically killed.

clarification_text: FOLLOWER OF ILIAN. LEGIONNAIRE. May be bestowed with multiple copies of MINOR GIFTS and MAJOR GIFTS OF ILIAN. Their effects are cumulative (when applicable).
flavor: These diminutive servants are noted for their twisted and deformed bodies, and their endless gibbering of meaningless phrases.
name: CHILD OF ILIAN
text: FOLLOWER OF ILIAN.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY DARK LEGION WARRIOR AT ANY TIME. This warrior may be bestowed with any Dark Symmetry card, including all GIFTS of all Apostles. If this card is discarded, attached Dark Symmetry cards remain.
name: CHOSEN
text: PLAY ON ANY DARK LEGION WARRIOR AT ANY TIME. This warrior may be bestowed with Dark Symmetry gifts from any Apostle.

name: CITADEL OF ALGEROTH
text: THIS CARD MAY BE ADDED TO YOUR KOHORT AS ONE ACTION. All Followers of Algeroth in your Kohort gain +2 to their A while CITADEL OF ALGEROTH is in play. You may not have two identical Citadels in play simultaneously.

name: CITADEL OF DEMNOGONIS
text: THIS CARD MAY BE ADDED TO YOUR KOHORT AS ONE ACTION. All Followers of Demnogonis in your Kohort gain +2 to their A while CITADEL OF DEMNOGONIS is in play. You may not have two identical Citadels in play simultaneously.

name: CITADEL OF ILIAN
text: THIS CARD MAY BE ADDED TO YOUR KOHORT AS ONE ACTION. All Followers of Ilian in your Kohort gain +2 to their A while CITADEL OF ILIAN is in play. You may not have two identical Citadels in play simultaneously.

name: CITADEL OF MUAWIJHE
text: THIS CARD MAY BE ADDED TO YOUR KOHORT AS ONE ACTION. All Followers of Muawijhe in your Kohort gain +2 to their A while CITADEL OF MUAWIJHE is in play. You may not have two identical Citadels in play simultaneously.

name: CITADEL OF SEMAI
text: THIS CARD MAY BE ADDED TO YOUR KOHORT AS ONE ACTION. All Followers of Semai in your Kohort gain +2 to their A while CITADEL OF SEMAI is in play. You may not have two identical Citadels in play simultaneously.

name: CLAN INFIGHTING
text: ASSIGN TO ANY IMPERIAL DOOMTROOPER. This warrior must kill a Imperial Doomtrooper to complete mission and earn twice the normal V. The mission-holder may attack non-Personality Imperial Doomtroopers until mission is fulfilled or otherwise removed.

clarification_text: Gains + to its F, S, and A when combating Dark Legion warriors.
name: CLANSMAN
text: Clansmen gain +1 to F when attacking the Dark Legion. When defending, F is normal.

clarification_text: GIVE TO AN IMPERIAL WARRIOR. Warrior gains +2 to F. If given to a CLANSMAN, it provides +4 to F (always) and +4 to A (when Fighting a Dark Legion warrior).
name: CLANSMAN CLAYMORE
text: MAY ONLY BE GIVEN TO AN IMPERIAL DOOMTROOPER. FIGHT WEAPON. +1 to F (always) and +1 to A (when Fighting the Dark Legion). With a Clansman, +2 to F (always) and +2 to A (when Fighting the Dark Legion) instead.

name: COMBAT ARMOR
text: Warrior gains +1 to A.

clarification_text: FIRST STRIKE. COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY.
flavor: Semi-intelligent and independent constructs of awesome fire-power, the combat warheads are state of the art battle-machines.
name: COMBAT WARHEAD
text: IMMUNE TO ALL DARK SYMMETRY CARDS.

name: COMMAND
text: ART OF CHANGELING. CAST AS AN ATTACK ACTION. Cost 6 D. Force an opponent's warrior to attack a warrior of your choice. If Attacker is hurt, its controller gets D equal to twice of its V. If the Defender is hurt, you get D equal to the Defender's V.

clarification_text: ARMOR. Warrior gains +4 to A.
name: COMPOSITE ARMOR
text: ARMOR. Warrior gains +4 to A. A warrior may only be equipped with one suit of Armor.

name: CONFUSE
text: GIFT OF MUAWIJHE. This warrior may change the Battle Tactics of a combat it is involved in at any time.

clarification_text: MAJOR GIFT OF SEMAI. Once per turn, as 1 action, choose 1 opposing warrior and declare that it must or must not attack during its player's next turn. If attacking, its player chooses the Defender. If not, its player may attack with a different warrior.
name: CONTROL MIND
text: GIFT OF SEMAI. Once per turn, as 3 actions, choose 1 enemy warrior and declare that it must or must not attack during its player's next turn. If attacking, its player chooses the Defender. If not, its player may attack with a different warrior.

clarification_text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. All players lose half their P (round down) and all their D.
name: CORPORATE SHENANIGANS
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. All players lose half their Promotion Points (round down) and all of their Destiny Points.

name: CORRUPT SHIELD
text: PLAY ON A DARK LEGION WARRIOR AT ANY TIME. The affected warrior is Immune to the effects of Art cards. This card remains with the warrior.

name: COWARDICE
text: PLAY ON ANY PLAYER AT ANY TIME. All of the affected player's warriors go into cover, and any warrior that already is in cover is discarde, unless its player spends 5 D.

name: CRENSHAW THE MORTIFICATOR
text: PERSONALITY. CONSIDERED A MORTIFICATOR. Crenshaw may conjure all aspects of the Art. While Crenshaw is in play, any warriors wounded by Mortificators are automatically killed.

text: Immune to the effects of DARK SYMMETRY GIFT cards, but not GIFT OF APOSTLE cards. May never cast Art Spells.

name: CURATOR SWORD
text: MAY ONLY BE GIVEN TO A DARK LEGION WARRIOR. FIGHT WEAPON. Warriors gains +2 F. A Curator wit this sword gets a +4 F instead. A warrior wounded by the Curator Sword is automatically killed.

name: CYBERCURITY MP
text: Immune to the effects of DARK SYMMETRY GIFT cards, but not GIFT OF APOSTLE cards. May never cast Art Spells.

name: CYBERNETIC POWER ARM

name: CYBERNETIC RETINAS
text: The warrior's F and S are +3, and the warrior is immune to cards which cause blindness.

text: DARK SYMMETRY GIFT. Dark Fire flows over the warrior's hands, giving a +1 to its F.

name: DECAY
text: GIFT OF DEMNOGONIS. By spending 10 D at any time, this warrior may discard any one equipment card in play.

text: PLAY ON ONE OF YOUR BROTHERHOOD WARRIORS AS ONE ACTION. From now on, all Brotherhood warriors in your Squad may use the Art of Premonition. If the warrior is killed, this card is discarded.

name: PRESENCE
text: ART OF PREMONITION. COMBAT SPELL. MAY ONLY BE CAST IF AFFECTED WARRIOR IS FIGHTING A DARK LEGION WARRIOR. For every 1 D, the affected warrior gains +1 to A.

clarification_text: FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH. ART IMMUNITY. May not have Dark Symmetry cards. You may join two Stalkers in the same Combat Area together. They combine their F, S, A and V and are considered a single warrior. The group may never separate, or join another Stalker. Other warrior cards with the PRETORIAN STALKER designation may not join.
name: PRETORIAN STALKER
text: FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH. IMMUNE TO THE ART. May not have Dark Symmetry cards. If you have two or more Pretorian Stalkers in your Kohort, add +2 to F and S when either is in combat.

name: PROFICIENCY
text: ART OF MENTALISM. CAST AT THE BEGINNING OF YOUR TURN. All spells this caster casts this turn cost 1 D less to cast or improve (minimum of 1 D). For instance, a spell that costs 3 D to give +1 to A would now only cost 2 D per +1.

clarification_text: ASSIGN TO ANY WARRIOR. Choose a warrior with a base V of at least twice this warrior's base V. This warrior must kill that warrior and survive the combat to complete the mission and earn points equal to three times the modified V of the slain warrior.
name: PROVE YOUR VALOR
text: ASSIGN TO ANY WARRIOR. Choose a warrior with a V of at least twice this warrior's. This warrior must kill that warrior and survive the combat to complete the mission and earn points equal to three times the V of the slain warrior.

clarification_text: GIVE TO ANY WARRIOR. If this warrior is attacked, it may change the Battle Tactics of the combat at any time during modification.
name: PSYCHO-SCANNER
text: If this warrior is attacked, it may immediately go into cover. Flip the warrior card face down for free.

clarification_text: GIVE TO ANY WARRIOR. FIGHT WEAPON. The warrior gains + to F. A warrior may use two Punisher Blades during combat. This card may never be discarded unless its controller is discarded as well (it may be annihilated).
name: PUNISHER BLADE
text: FIGHT WEAPON. This warrior gains +1 to F.

clarification_text: GIVE TO ANY WARRIOR. FIGHT/SHOOT WEAPON and HANDGUN. The warrior gains +2 to F and S. A warrior may use two HANDGUNS during combat. This card may never be discarded unless its controller is discarded as well (it may be annihilated).
name: PUNISHER HANDGUN
text: HANDGUN. FIGHT/SHOOT WEAPON. Warrior gains +1 to F and S. A warrior may attack using two handguns.

clarification_text: GIVE TO ANY WARRIOR. VEHICLE. AIRSHIP. The warrior gains +4 to S and A. For 5D it may escape any Fight combat (even if the warrior is outside the Shark). If it does this the Shark is discarded.
name: PURPLE SHARK
text: AIRSHIP AND VECHICLE. A WARRIOR CAN ONLY HAVE 1 VEHICLE. While flying this airship, the warrior's S and A are +4. For 5 D, it may escape a Fight combat. When the warrior uses the Purple Shark, flip a coin. If heads, the warrior is wounded, and the Purple Shark is discarded.

name: RADAR SCANNER
text: GIVE TO ANY WARRIOR. This warrior may not be attacked by airships.

clarification_text: VEHICLE. AIRSHIP. May never take part in Fight combats, seek cover, or use Equipment. Opponents do not gain the effects of Fortifications while combating the RAMS AIR CAVALRY.
name: RAMS AIR CAVALRY
text: CONSIDERED AN AIRSHIP AND A VEHICLE. Can only take part in shoot combats. Can't seek cover or use equipment. Attacks ignore opponent's fortifications.

clarification_text: FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH. If the Razide is wounded, you may spend XD at any time to heal the wound, where X is the Razide's modified A. Wounds that kill the Razide may be healed in this manner, even those that automatically kill.
name: RAZIDE
text: FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH.

clarification_text: ASSIGN TO ANY CYBERTRONIC WARRIOR. This warrior must kill a Cybertronic warrior to complete the mission and earn twice the normal V. This warrior may attack non-Personality Cybertronic warriors until the mission is fulfilled or otherwise removed.
name: RECALLED
text: ASSIGN TO ANY CYBERTRONIC DOOMTROOPER. This warrior must kill a Cybertronic Doomtrooper to complete the mission and earn twice the normal V. The mission-holder may attack non-Personality Cybertronic Doomtroopers until mission is fulfilled or otherwise removed.

clarification_text: PLAY ON ANY WARRIOR DURING COMBAT. For every 7D, one of your warriors assists the affected warrior during this combat. The F's and S's of the group are added together. The opponent chooses which warrior to attack. Doomtroopers may not reinforce the Dark Legion and vice versa. Reinforcements must be legal combatants.
name: REINFORCEMENTS!
text: PLAY ON A WARRIOR DURING COMBAT. For every 7 D, one of your warriors assists the affected warrior this combat. The F's and S's of the group are added together. The opponent may choose which warrior to attach. Doomtrooper may not reinforce the Dark Legion and vice versa, nor may reinforcements be of the same corp as the opponent.

clarification_text: PLAY ON ANY FREELANCER AS ONE ACTION. The warrior is redeemed. It is now a member of its home corp again. It can now earn Promotion Points and has full access to all cards specific to its home corporation. Its F, S, A and V are +1. Keep this card with the warrior. If it loses membership again, this card (and its effects) are discarded.
name: REINSTATEMENT
text: PLAY ON ANY FREELANCER AS ONE ACTION. The warrior is redeemed. It is now a member of its home corp again. It can now earn Promotion Points and has full acces to all cards specific to its home corporation. Its F, S, A and V are +1. Keep this card with the warrior. If it loses membership again, this card (and its effects) are discarded.

clarification_text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. All HERETICS in play are discarded. No points are earned.
name: REPENTANCE
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. All heretics in play are discarded.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY WARRIOR AS TWO ACTIONS. While attached, the affected warrior gains +5 to V.
name: REPUTATION
text: PLAY ON ANY WARRIOR AS THREE ACTIONS. The affected warrior gains +3 to its V. This card remains with the warrior.

name: RESIST ELEMENTS
text: ART OF ELEMENTS. PERSONAL COMBAT SPELL. Caster automatically gains +1 to A. For every 2 D, the caster gains +1 to A.

name: RESIST PAIN
text: DARK SYMMETRY GIFT. The warrior gains +1 to A.

clarification_text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION. Your earned Promotion Points and Destiny Points may be freely exchanged in either direction at a ratio of 5D to 1P. You may only play this card once per game.
name: RETRAINING
text: PLAY THIS CARD AS ONE ACTION. Your earned Promotion Points and Destiny Points may be freely exchanged in either direction at a ratio of 5 Destiny Points to 1 Promotion Points.

clarification_text: PLAY DURING COMBAT. Your warrior withdraws from the battle. Being partially victorious, your opponent receives Promotion Points equal to half of the V (round up) of your warrior.
name: RETREAT!
text: PLAY DURING COMBAT. Your warrior withdraws from the battle. Being partially victorious, your opponent received Promotion Points equal to half of the V (round up) of your warrior.

name: REVELATION
text: PLAY ON ANY DOOMTROOPER AT ANY TIME. The affected warrior may immediately cast any Art spell. You must immediately play the Art card that the warrior is casting. You must still pay any costs listed on the Art card.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY FIGHT WEAPON, BUT NOT A FIGHT/SHOOT WEAPON. Warrior gains +1 to F.
name: REVERBERATING SHARPENER
text: ATTACH TO ANY FIGHT, BUT NOT A FIGHT/SHOOT WEAPON. Warrior gains +1 to F.

clarification_text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. You may switch the Destiny Points in your pool with the Destiny Points in another player's pool (even if a pool contains 0 D).
name: REVERSAL OF FORTUNE
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. You may switch the Destiny Points in your pool with the Destiny Points in another player's pool.

clarification_text: May conjure the Arts of MANIPULATION and MENTALISM. INQUISITORS in the same Combat Area with the Revisor gain +2 to F, S, and A. Multiple Revisors provide cumulative bonuses.
name: REVISOR
text: Revisors may conjure the Arts of Manipulation and Mentalism.

clarification_text: You may not add the Rogue to your Squad if you have other Imperial Warriors there already, and Imperial warriors may not be added to your Squad if the Rogue is already there.
name: ROGUE
text: You may not add the Rouge to your Squad if you have other Imperial warriors there already, and Imperial warriors may not be added to your Squad if the Rouge is already there.

clarification_text: PLAY DURING A TEAM GAME AT THE END OF YOUR TURN. You may immediately take another turn.
name: RUTHLESS EFFICIENCY
text: PLAY AT THE END OF YOUR TURN. You may immediately take another turn.

clarification_text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. Choose one of the five Corporations, the Brotherhood, or the Dark Legion. All members of that affiliation in play must discard all of their Equipment cards.
name: SABOTAGE!
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. Choose one of the five corporations, the Brotherhood, or the Dark Legion. All members of that organization in play must discard all of their equipment cards.

clarification_text: May conjure the Arts of PREMONITION and EXORCISM. Gains + to F, S, and A when combating Dark Legion warriors.
name: SACRED WARRIOR
text: Sacred Warriors may conjure the Arts of Premonition and Exorcism.

clarification_text: FIRST STRIKE (during Fight combats).
flavor: The Samurai of the Mishima Corporation are elite soldiers forming the personal bodyguards of the Lord Heirs and their liege.
name: SAMURAI

clarification_text: BUILD IN YOUR SQUAD. CITY. All of your Capitol members gain + to their A while San Dorado is in play.
name: SAN DORADO
text: THIS CARD MAY BE ADDED TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. CAPITOL CITY. All of your Capitol members gain +2 to their A while SAN DORADO is in play. You may not have two identical Cities in play simultaneously.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A MISHIMA DOOMTROOPER. FIGHT WEAPON. The warrior gains + to its F, and its opponent loses 3 to f.
name: SCALPER
text: MAY ONLY BE GIVEN TO A MISHIMA DOOMTROOPER. FIGHT WEAPON. The warrior gains +1 to its F, and -1 is applied to its opponent's F in combat due to the horrific nature of the weapon.

clarification_text: FOLLOWER OF MUAWIJHE. LEGIONNAIRE. If any of your warriors invokes the Dark Symmetry WIND OF INSANITY, each of your Screaming Legionnaires in the same Combat Area as the warrior causes an additional +2 to the damage inflicted.
name: SCREAMING LEGIONNAIRE
text: FOLLOWER OF MUAWIJHE. NO DARK SYMMETRY CARDS ALLOWED. Once per game as 3 actions you can invoke WINDS OF INSANITY. For each of your Screaming Legionnaires, every warrior in play takes 1 point of damage. If this is equal to or greater than a warriors A is it wounded.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A DARK LEGION WARRIOR. FIGHT/SHOOT WEAPON. Warrior gains +4 to F and S and is a SLAYER. If given to a PRETORIAN STALKER, that warrior gains +8 to S instead (F is still +4).
name: SCYTHE OF SEMAI
text: MAY ONLY BE GIVEN TO A DARK LEGION WARRIOR. FIGHT/SHOOT WEAPON. Warrior gains +4 to F and S. Warriors wounded by the Scyth of Semai are automatically killed. If given to a Pretorian Stalker, that warrior gains +8 to S instead of +4.

clarification_text: SLAYER.
flavor: The Sea Lions are the pride of the Capitol Navy; an elite amphibious strikeforce currently used in the Graveton Archipelago on Venus.
name: SEA LION

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. HERO. CLANSMAN. COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. If Gallagher kills a Dark Legion warrior in combat, he earns an additional 3P. Other CLANSMEN have COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY while in the same Combat Area as Gallagher.
name: SEAN GALLAGHER
text: PERSONALITY. CONSIDERED A CLANSMAN. If you attack with Sean Gallagher, you must attack a Dark Legion warrior if there is one available. While Gallagher is in play all of your Clansmen warriors are immune to the effects of Dark Symmetry cards.

clarification_text: BUILD IN YOUR COMBAT AREA. Provides +4 to A to all warriors in the same Area as this card. The Secret HQ may never be discarded or annihilated. Each of your Combat Areas may have one Secret HQ in it.
name: SECRET HQ
text: Spend 5 D and and put this card in play as one action. If you don't have any warriors in play, enemy warriors may not attack you. You must spend 5 D during your Draw step each turn to keep this card in play.

clarification_text: You may conduct a secret mission. When the mission is fulfilled, play the Mission card and this card. You must be able to prove that you completed the mission fairly and legally. You gain all of the benefits of the completed mission.
name: SECRET MISSION
text: You may conduct a secret mission. When the mission is done, play its card and this card. You must be able to prove that you completed the mission fairly and legally. You gain all of the benefits of the completed mission.

name: SEND DREAMS
text: GIFT OF MUAWIJHE. By spending 5 D at any time, this warrior may send horrific dreams to any enemy warrior, causing it to go into cover. Flip the affected warrior face down.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. SERGEANT. BLOOD BERET. Other BLOOD BERETS  gain + to F and S while in the same Combat Area with McBride.
name: SGT. MCBRIDE
text: PERSONALITY. CONSIDERED A BLOOD BERET. While McBride is in play, all Blood Berets (but not McBride himself) gain +1 to F and  S.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY WARRIOR AS ONE ACTION. For every 2D this warrior spends during combat, its S is increased by +1 until the end of combat.
name: SHARPSHOOTER
text: PLAY ON ANY WARRIOR AS 3 ACTIONS. The affected warrior gains +1 to its S for every 2 D spent during combat. This card remains with the warrior.

clarification_text: GIVE TO ANY WARRIOR. FIGHT/SHOOT WEAPON. HANDGUN. Warrior gains +2 to F and S. A warrior may use two HANDGUNS during combat.
name: SHERMAN .74 MODEL 13 "BOLTER"
text: HANDGUN. FIGHT/SHOOT WEAPON. Warrior gains +2 to F and S. A warrior may attack using two handguns.

name: SHIELD
text: ART OF KINETICS. PERSONAL COMBAT SPELL. For every 1 D spent, caster gains +1 to A

clarification_text: GIVE ONLY TO A DARK LEGION WARRIOR. SHOOT WEAPON. + to S. If this warrior kills a warrior with the Shrieketh, place any HERETIC from your collection into your Kohort. You still earn points from the kill.
name: SHRIEKETH
text: MAY ONLY BE GIVEN TO A DARK LEGION WARRIOR. SHOOT WARRIOR. +1 TO S. Warriors killed with the Shrieketh become Heretics under your control. Place a Heretic card from your collection into your Kohort. If you can't, still discard the warrior.

clarification_text: MAJOR GIFT OF SEMAI. As one action and 5D, this warrior may cast a swirling fog throughout the battlefield. Only you may perform Tactical Actions (of any type) until the beginning of your next turn.
name: SHROUD
text: GIFT OF SEMAI. As one action no combat may take place until the begining of your next turn.

clarification_text: ASSIGN TO ANY PLAYER. Kill a warrior protected by a Citadel to earn twice its normal V.
name: SIEGE OF THE CITADEL
text: ASSIGN TO ANY PLAYER. Kill a warrior protected by a Citadel to earn twice its normal V.

clarification_text: MAJOR GIFT OF MUAWIJHE. As one action, this warrior may put any one warrior in play to sleep. The affected warrior is a NONCOMBATANT until the beginning of your next turn.
name: SLEEP
text: GIFT OF MUAWIJHE. As one action, this warrior may put any enemy warrior to sleep. The affected warrior may not attack or be attacked until the begining of your next turn.

clarification_text: GIVE TO ANY WARRIOR. SHOOT WEAPON. MACHINE GUN. Warrior gains + to S.
name: SMG MK. III "INTERCEPTOR"
text: SUB-MACHINE GUN. SHOOT WEAPON. Warrior gains +2 to S.

clarification_text: GIVE TO ANY WARRIOR. Warrior may detonate the Smoke Bomb during combat by discarding this card. It retreats from the combat "before it begins," ending the attack action. All other cards played during the combat have no effect (but are still discarded/annihilated as normal).
name: SMOKE BOMB
text: A warrior may detonate a smoke bomb by discarding this card. The warrior may retreat from a combat before it begins, end the attack action.

clarification_text: ASSIGN TO ANY PLAYER. Kill an enemy Brotherhood warrior to complete the mission and earn an additional 5P. Alternatively, turn an enemy Brotherhood member into a HERETIC and earn 8P.
name: SNUB THE CARDINAL
text: ASSIGN TO ANY PLAYER. Kill a Brotherhood warrior to complete the mission and earn 3 extra Promotion Points. Alternatively, turn a Brotherhood member into a Heretic and earn 10 Promotion Points.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY NON-CAPITOL DOOMTROOPER AT ANY TIME. While attached, the affected warrior is considered a member of the Capitol Corporation, in addition to any memberships it currently holds.
name: SPECIAL COMMENDATION
text: PLAY ON ANY NON-CAPITOL DOOMTROOPER AT ANY TIME. The affected warrior is now considered a member of the Capitol Corporation, in addition to any memberships it currently holds.

clarification_text: PERSONAL COMBAT SPELL. Caster has FIRST STRIKE during this combat. If the caster wounds the opponent, the combat is over. If not, opponent retaliates. This all happens AFTER playing ALL combat modifiers.
name: SPEED
text: ART OF MENTALISM. PERSONAL COMBAT SPELL. The caster strikes at its opponent first. If the caster wounds the opponent, the combat is over. If not, then check if the caster is wounded. This all happens after playing all combat modifiers.

clarification_text: GIVE THIS CARD TO A WARRIOR AS ONE ACTION. The warrior is protected by a spike-covered wall and gains +1 to A. The warrior can not make a Fight attack but may be attacked by one. You can give this card to a different warrior in the same combat area as one action.
name: SPIKED BARRICADE
text: GIVE THIS CARD TO A WARRIOR AS ONE ACTION. The warrior is protected by a spike-covered wall and gains +1 to A. The warrior can not make a Fight attack but may be attacked by one. You can give this card to a different warrior as one action.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY NON-BAUHAUS DOOMTROOPER AT ANY TIME. While attached, the affected warrior is considered a member of the Bauhaus Corporation, in addition to any memberships it currently holds.
name: SPOKE IN THE COG
text: PLAY ON ANY NON-BAUHAUS DOOMTROOPER AT ANY TIME. The affected warrior is now considered a member of the Bauhaus Corporation in addition to any membership it currently holds.

clarification_text: PLAY WHEN AN OPPOSING WARRIOR COMPLETES A MISSION. The warrior who completed the mission was your spy. You gain all the points the warrior earned, and its controller receives nothing. Also, the warrior is discarded.
name: SPY IN THE RANKS
text: PLAY WHEN AN OPPONENT'S WARRIOR COMPLETES A MISSION. You gain all the points the warrior earned,and its controller receives nothing. Also, the warrior is discarded.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY HERETIC WITH AT LEAST ONE DARK SYMMETRY GIFT AT ANY TIME. The Heretic may be bestowed with any Dark Symmetry card at any time and at no action cost. If this card is discarded or annihilated, ALL of the HERETIC's Dark Symmetry cards are discarded.
name: STIGMATA
text: PLAY ANY TIME ON A HERETIC WITH AT LEAST 1 DARK SYMMETRY GIFT. The Dark Symmetry mutates the Heretic. It is forever a member of the Dark Legion and may receive any Dark Symmetry gift from any Dark Apostle at any time at no action cost.

clarification_text: PLAY DURING YOUR TURN, EXCEPT DURING COMBAT. You may return any one of your cards in play to your hand.
name: STRATEGIC RESTRUCTURING
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME DURING YOUR TURN, EXCEPT DURING COMBAT. You may return one of your cards in play to your hand.

name: STRENGTH OF WILL
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. Your warriors are not affected by Dark Symmetry cards until the beginning of your next turn. Your Dark Legion warriors may still use their Dark Symmetry gifts as normal.

name: STRIKE
text: ART OF KINETICS. PERSONAL COMBAT SPELL. For every 1 D spent, the caster gains +1 to S.

name: SUGGESTION
text: ART OF MANIPULATION. Cast during an opponent's attack action, before the Attacker is announced. Tell the affected player which of his or her warriors is the Attacker for this combat. That warrior must attack, but its player picks the Defender.

clarification_text: ASSIGN TO ANY WARRIOR. If this warrior is killed in combat, the mission is completed. The player controlling the warrior earns P equal to the warrior's V, and 3 more if the warrior killed another warrior in its final battle (in addition to the points form the kill).
name: SUICIDE MISSION
text: ASSIGN TO ANY WARRIOR. If this warrior is killed, the mission is completed. The player controlling the warrior earns Promotion Points equal to the warrior's V, and 3 more if the warrior killed another warrior in its final battle.

clarification_text: COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. May never use Equipment. The Suicide Warhead is killed if it becomes wounded.
name: SUICIDE WARHEAD
text: IMMUNE TO ALL DARK SYMMETRY CARDS. May not use equipment. The Suicide Warhead is killed if it becomes wounded.

clarification_text: Gains +2 to F, S, and A for each other Capitol-affiliated warrior in the same Combat Area.
flavor: Deployed on Mercury, the Sunset Strikers act as Capitol's special commando unit for fighting Mishima troops on their own home planet.
name: SUNSET STRIKER

clarification_text: PLAY DURING COMBAT. The Attacker gains FIRST STRIKE for this combat only. If the Defender is wounded, the combat ends. If not, the Defender retaliates.
name: SURPRISE ATTACK
text: PLAY DURING COMBAT. The combat is not simultaneous. Resolve the Attacker's attack first. If the Defender is wounded, the combat is over. If not, resolve the Defender's attack. This all happens after playing all combat modifiers.

clarification_text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION. Discard any one Fortification card or a card considered a FORTIFICATION in play.
name: SURPRISE INVASION!
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. As one action, one Fortification in play, chosen by you, is discarded.

clarification_text: PLAY IMMEDIATELY AFTER ANY MISHIMA WARRIOR IS KILLED IN COMBAT. The warrior who killed the Mishima warrior is wounded. If killed, points are earned. If more than one copy of this card is played, only the first one played takes effect.
name: SWORN VENGEANCE
text: PLAY IMMEDIATELY AFTER ANY MISHIMA WARRIOR IS KILLED IN COMBAT. The warrior who killed the Mishima warrior receives a wound. If it is killed, you earn the Value points. If more than one Sworn Vengeance card is played, only the first one played takes effect.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A BAUHAUS WARRIOR. VEHICLE. TANK. While inside the T-32, the warrior's base F, S, A, and V are doubled. No other WEAPONS may be used when using the T-32.
name: T-32 "WOLFCLAW" JBT
text: MAY BE GIVEN TO ANY BAUHAUS DOOMTROOPER. TANK AND VEHICLE. A WARRIOR CAN ONLY HAVE 1 VEHICLE. With this tank, the warrior's F, S, A and V are doubled. No other weapons may be used when using the Wolfclaw.

clarification_text: PLAY AT ANY TIME DURING COMBAT. You may change the Battle Tactics at any time during this combat, and as often as you wish.
name: TACTICAL ADVANTAGE
text: PLAY DURING COMBAT. You may change the battle tactics for this combat.

name: TAINTED CONJURER
text: GIVE TO ANY HERETIC ANY TIME. For the remainder of the game, the affected Heretic may cast any Art spell if you first spend 3 D for each casting.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY DOOMTROOPER AT ANY TIME EXCEPT COMBAT. The warrior is now a Dark Legion spy. It keeps all Doomtrooper memberships (attacking rules still apply), but is also considered a HERETIC of the Dark Legion. MINOR GIFTS and MINOR HERETIC GIFTS cards may be bestowed on it as normal.
name: TAINTED!
text: PLAY ANY TIME ON ANY DOOMTROOPER. This warrior is now a Dark Legion spy. It keeps all Doomtrooper memberships, but it is also considered a Heretic of the Dark Legion. Dark Symmetry cards can be played on it.

clarification_text: PLAY DURING YOUR TURN. For each extra action you devote to a single attack, your attacking warrior gains + to its F and S. For example, a 3 action attack will provide +6 to F and S.
name: TAKE AIM
text: PLAY DURING COMBAT. Warrior gains +1 to F and S.

name: TAKE COVER
text: PLAY ON YOUR WARRIOR DURING COMBAT IF IT IS THE DEFENDER. Your warrior hastily finds cover. Flip its cards over. The hasty cover only gives a +3 to A. After the combat, the warrior remains in cover, and the cover becomes normal.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. SAMURAI. COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. SLAYER. You may discard Tatsu during your turn (not during combat) to discard any warrior in play (no points are earned). Other SAMURAI have COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY and are SLAYERS while in the same Combat Area as Tatsu.
name: TATSU
text: PERSONALITY. CONSIDERED A SAMURAI. While Tatsu is in play, all of your Samurai are immune to the effects of Dark Symmetry cards.

clarification_text: CAST AT ANY TIME. You may tell an opponent that he or she must attack a specific warrior during his or her next turn. That player must attack that warrior if able gets to choose the Attacker.
name: TELEPATHIC MESSAGE
text: ART OF MANIPULATION. Cast any time. You may tell an opponent that he or she must attack a specific warrior during his or her next turn. That player gets to choose which of his or her warriors to attack with.

name: TELEPORTATION
text: ART OF KINETICS. CAST ANY TIME. For every 1 D spent, you may transfer any one equipment card from any Doomtrooper to any other Doomtrooper in play in the same Squad. Your equipment cards may also be teleported back into your hand.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY SHOOT WEAPON OR FIGHT/SHOOT WEAPON. Warrior gains +1 to S. Weapon may only have one Telescopic Sight.
name: TELESCOPIC SIGHT
text: ATTACH TO ANY SHOOT WEAPON. Warrior gains +1 to S.

clarification_text: FOLLOWER OF ILIAN. The Templarss may be bestowed with any Dark Symmetry card.
name: TEMPLAR
text: FOLLOWER OF ILIAN.

name: TERROR
text: DARK SYMMETRY GIFT. Opponents of this warrior are stricken with nearly paralyzing fear which causes -1 to their A.

clarification_text: BUILD IN YOUR SQUAD. CITY. All of your Brotherhood members gain + to their A while The Cathedral is in play.
name: THE CATHEDRAL
text: THIS CARD MAY BE ADDED TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. BROTHERHOOD CITY. All of your Brotherhood members gain +2 to their A while THE CATHEDRAL is in play. You may not have two identical Cathedrals in play simultaneously.

clarification_text: BUILD IN YOUR SQUAD. CITY. All of your Cybertronic members gain + to their A while the HQ is in play.
name: THE HQ
text: THIS CARD MAY BE ADDED TO YOUR SQUAD AS ONE ACTION. CYBERTRONIC CITY. All of your Cybertronic members gain +2 to their A while THE HQ is in play. You may not have two identical Cities in play simultaneously.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A NON-BROTHERHOOD DOOMTROOPER. The warrior may take Ticker during combat by discarding this card. Once taken, the warrior's F and S are +2, and it may not be wounded or killed. After the combat, Ticker wears off, and the warrior automatically receives one wound.
name: TICKER
text: GIVE TO ANY NON-BROTHERHOOD DOOMTROOPER. The warrior may take Ticker during combat by discarding this card. Once taken, the warrior's F and S are +2, and it may not be wounded or killed. After the combat, Ticker wears off, and the warrior automatically receives one wound.

clarification_text: MAJOR GIFT OF ILIAN. This warrior may attack twice as one Tactical Action. It may attack a single warrior twice or attack two separate warriors once each. Announce all attacks before any begin. Conduct each attack separately.
name: TIME DEATH
text: GIFT OF ILIAN. This warrior always gets the upper hand in battle. Resolve its attack first. If it wounds its opponent, the combat is over. If not, then resolve the opponent's attack. This all happens after playing all combat modifiers.

clarification_text: MAJOR GIFT OF DEMNOGONIS. As one action, this warrior may age an enemy warrior. Place an Age marker on the affected warrior. For every Age marker, that warrior suffers -2 to F, S and A.
name: TIME ROT
text: GIFT OF DEMNOGONIS. As 1 action, this warrior may age an enemy warrior. Place a marker on the affected warrior. For every 3 age markers, that warrior suffers a -1 F, S, A and V. If the warriors V reaches zero, discard the warrior.

clarification_text: ASSIGN TO ANY BAUHAUS WARRIOR. This warrior must kill a Bauhaus warrior to complete the mission and earn twice the normal V. This warrior may attack non-Personality Bauhaus warriors until the mission is fulfilled or otherwise removed.
name: TRAITOR DISCOVERED
text: ASSIGN TO ANY BAUHAUS DOOMTROOPER. This warrior must kill a Bauhaus Doomtrooper to complete the mission and earn twice the normal V. The mission-holder may attack non-Personality Bauhaus Doomtrooper until mission is fulfilled or otherwise removed.

clarification_text: May Entrench itself as one action. While Entrenched, the Trencher gains + to its F and A, but it may not attack (it may be attacked as normal). It may leave its Entrenchment at any time.
name: TRENCHER
text: The Trencher may dig a FOXHOLE as three actions. If this is done, take a FOXHOLE card from your collection and place it with this warrior. The Trencher is then in the FOXHOLE.

clarification_text: MAJOR GIFT OF ILIAN. For every 6D it spends during combat, this warrior may call a reinforcement from the same Combat Area to assist it in battle. Your warriors add their F's and S's. The Defender chooses which warrior to attack.
name: TRUE GATE
text: GIFT OF ILIAN. For every 10 D, this warrior may call a reinforcement from your Kohort to assit in a battle it is involved in. Your warriors add their attack ratings together. The Defender chooses which warrior to attack.

name: TRUE PATH
text: ART OF PREMONITION. CAST DURING YOUR DRAW STEP BEFORE DRAWING. For every 3 D draw 1 extra card. Keep 1 of the cards and discard the rest. Before drawing decide how many extra cards to draw.

clarification_text: PLAY AT ANY TIME YOU HAVE 5 PROMOTION POINTS OR MORE. Flip a coin. If the result is heads, you gain 20 D. If the result is tails, you lose 5 Promotion Points.
name: TWIST OF FATE
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME YOU HAVE 5 PROMOTION POINTS OR MORE. Flip a coin. If the result is heads, you gain 20 D. If the result is tails, you lose 5 Promotion Points.

clarification_text: If the Twitcher is equiped with TICKER, its F and S ratings increase by +1 in addition to the effects of TICKER. Twitcher is not wounded by TICKER.
name: TWITCHER
text: If the Twitcher is equipped with TICKER, its F and S ratings increase by +1 in addition to the effects of TICKER. Twitcher is not wounded by TICKER.

clarification_text: FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH. LEGIONNAIRE. May never have attachments. Gains +1 to F, S and A for each additional UNDEAD LEGIONNAIRE in the same Combat Area. You may have any number of Undead Legionnaires in your deck.
name: UNDEAD LEGIONNAIRE
text: FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH. Undead Legionnaires are zombies; humans killed in battle and reanimated with the help of the Dark Symmetry.

clarification_text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION. For every 3D you spend, one Mission or Special card in play, chosen by you, is discarded.
name: UNDERCOVER AGENTS
text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION. For every 3 D, one mission card in play, chosen by you, is discarded.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. HERO. ETOILES MORTANT. SLAYER. COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. BLESSED. Other ETOILES MORTANT are SLAYERS while in the same Combat Area with Duval. Discard any one of your ETOILES MORTANT at any time to discard any Dark Legion warrior in play.
name: VALERIE DUVAL
text: PERSONALITY. CONSIDERED A MEMBER OF THE TOILES MOURANTES. While Valerie Duval is in play, all of your toiles Mourantes are immune to the effeckts of Dark Symmetry cards.

clarification_text: May conjure the Arts of CHANGELING and PREMONITION. Gain +2 to their F, S, and A when they attack. When they are attacked, their ratings are normal.
name: VALKYRIE
text: Valkyries may conjure the Arts of Changeling and Premonition.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A DARK LEGION WARRIOR. FIGHT WEAPON. Warrior gains +5 to F. The Vassht may never be given to another warrior, and this warrior may never own another FIGHT or FIGHT/SHOOT WEAPON (even if this weapon is discarded).
name: VASSHT
text: MAY ONLY BE GIVEN TO A DARK LEGION WARRIOR. FIGHT WEAPON. Once equipped, the Vassht may never be given to another warrior, and this warrior may never own another Fight or Fight/Shoot weapon. It gives the warrior +2 to its F.

clarification_text: MINOR SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. Venusian Rangers gain +2 to their F, S, and A when they attack. When attacked, their ratings are normal.
name: VENUSIAN RANGER
text: Venusian Rangers are immune to the effects of all DARK SYMMETRY GIFT cards, but not GIFT OF APOSTLE cards.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A BAUHAUS WARRIOR. FIGHT WEAPON. The warrior gains +4 to F.
name: VIOLATOR SWORD
text: MAY ONLY BE GIVEN TO A BAUHAUS Doomtrooper. FIGHT WEAPON. The warrior gains +2 to F.

clarification_text: ASSIGN TO ANY PLAYER. Keep at least one warrior from each of the five Corporations and the Brotherhood in your Squad for one full turn (from the end of this turn to the end of your next turn) to complete the mission and earn 10P.
name: WELL-ROUNDED SQUAD
text: ASSIGN TO ANY PLAYER. Keep at least one warrior from each of the five Corporations and the Brotherhood in your squad for one full turn (from the end of this turn until the end of your next turn) to complete the mission and earn 10 Promotion Points.

clarification_text: ASSIGN TO ANY MORTIFICATOR. This warrior must kill a non-Personality Brotherhood warrior to complete the mission and earn twice the normal V.
name: WHISPERS OF HERESY
text: ASSIGN TO ANY MORTIFICATOR. This warrior must kill a Brotherhood warrior to complete the mission and earn twice the normal V. The killed warrior may not be a Personality.

clarification_text: MAJOR GIFT OF MUAWIJHE. Once per turn, as 1 Tactical Action, this warrior may invoke Winds of Insanity. For every 5D, every warrior in play takes 1 point of damage. If this is equal to or greater than a warrior's A, it is wounded. Warriors killed this way earn points.
name: WIND OF INSANITY
text: GIFT OF MUAWIJHE. Once per turn, as 1 action, this warrior may invoke Winds of Insanity. For every 5 D, each warrior in play takes 1 point damage. If this is equal to or greater than a warrior's A, it is wounded. Warriors killed this way earn points. This doesn't count as an attack.

clarification_text: CLANSMAN. WOLFBANE. Combat opponents are 3 to a unless there is a Fortification in the same Combat Area as the opponent, in which case opponents are + to A.
name: WOLFBANE LIGHT CAVALRY
text: Opponents of the Wolfbane Cavalry suffer a -3 to A unless the opponent is protected by a fortification, in which case their A is increased by +3.

clarification_text: PERSONALITY. HERO. HATAMOTO. ASSASSIN. COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY. Other HATAMOTO are ASSASSINS and have COMPLETE SYMMETRY IMMUNITY while in the same Combat Area with Yojimbo.
name: YOJIMBO
text: PERSONALITY. CONSIDERED A HATAMOTO. While Yojimbo is in play, all of your Hatamoto are immune to the effects of Dark Symmetry cards.

clarification_text: You may discard the Young Guard at any time to negate the effects of any just-played Special card. Any actions or D spent to play the Special are lost.
name: YOUNG GUARD
text: Young Guards may never voluntarily seek cover, and they refuse to gain the benefits of fortifications.

clarification_text: FOLLOWER OF MUAWIJHE. If the Soulslayer is wounded in combat, you may discard a SCREAMING LEGIONNAIRE from the same Combat Area to prevent the wound, even a wound that automatically kills.
name: ZENITHIAN SOULSLAYER
text: FOLLOWER OF MUAWIJHE.
